plot: Stanley, an image manipulation expert, is up against a fierce adversary in a media battle that will decide the outcome of a political campaign, and of life as he knows it.
title: Keeper of the Past
plot_es: Stanley, an image manipulation expert, is up against a fierce adversary in a media battle that will decide the outcome of a political campaign, and of life as he knows it.
plot_en: Stanley, an image manipulation expert, is up against a fierce adversary in a media battle that will decide the outcome of a political campaign, and of life as he knows it.
